        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • add

        public int add​(E entry)
        If heap has a node with value 'entry' . Incereases this nodes num by 1. If heap has not a node with value 'entry'.Inserts entry to end of the heap which is also end of the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        entry - E

      • add

        public int add​(MaxHeap.HeapNode<E> entry)

      • remove

        public MaxHeap.HeapNode<E> remove()
        Remove method for MaxHeap.If Head Node's Value's Occurences are bigger than 1.Decreases it by 1. If Head Node's Value's Occurence is 1. Removes the Head Node.
        Returns:
        root of the Heap which is 0'th element of the ArrayList
